snippet: Gottfrid Svartholm Warg, a founder of the Pirate Bay who was living in Cambodia, was convicted in Sweden of violating copyright laws and faces a one-year prison term.
abstract: Gottfrid Svartholm Warg, co-founder of file-sharing site Pirate Bay, is arrested in Cambodia at the request of Sweden, where he faces a one-year prison term for violating copyright laws.
lead_paragraph: Gottfrid Svartholm Warg, a founder of the Pirate Bay who was living in Cambodia, was convicted in Sweden of violating copyright laws and faces a one-year prison term.

headline.seo: Pirate Bay Co-Founder Arrested in Cambodia
headline.main: File-Sharing Site’s Co-Founder Is Arrested on 2009 Conviction
headline.print_headline: File-Sharing Site’s Co-Founder Is Arrested on 2009 Conviction
